meanings.definition: To participate in the sport of windsurfing.
meanings.sent1: Tomorrow, I will windsurf for the first time and feel the wind in my hair.
meanings.sent2: She loves to windsurf on windy days when the waves are high.
meanings.sent3: I tried to windsurf, but I ended up going in circles like a confused duck.
meanings.sent4: As I windsurfed across the lake, I felt free as a bird soaring in the sky.
meanings.sent5: Windsurfing allows you to connect with nature as you ride the waves with the wind.
